item.title: Meeting #2 - The Birth of the Clinic
item.description:
We will be reading the preface (pg. ix - xix) and Chapter 6 (pg. 88 - 109) from The Birth of the Clinic by Michel Foucault.

Location: TBD

Download

item.title: Meeting #1 - Prolegomena pt. 1
item.description:
For our first meeting we’ll be reading pages 1 - 31 (“Preface” through “Prolegomena General Question”) of Kant’s Prolegomena to Any Future Metaphysics.

Location: We’ll meet at Tatte Bakery & Cafe, Fenway at 11:00 and walk over to Ramler park across the street.

Download
